Nancy Elizabeth returns with a graceful third album that isn't afraid of its own intelligence. She doesnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t overegg the pudding, paring the arrangements down to the essential, and rightly giving her glassily elegant vocals room to breathe - whether soloing intimately and unadorned or studio-spun into vast waves of harmony.
